column4: hi just install ubuntu for 3 days now, need help on totem movie player.. anyone wants to help me?
how to play dvd or mp3
enable universe, and install from synaptic
you are in the right place. ask away
gnome is your environment. gtk is a library for display. gtk1 < gtk2
well, for display of text boxes,menus etc
there is a help guide which will help you start off
it will tell you how to do basic tasks with your ubuntu machine
totem can play mp3 and other stuff if you install a few more packages
hoary was ubuntu 5.04. breezy is ubuntu v 5.10
